## loadConfig() function

Load the vaultkeeper config from disk, falling back to defaults if the file does not exist.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function loadConfig(configDir?: string): Promise<VaultConfig>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

configDir


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Directory containing config.json. Defaults to platform-appropriate path.


</td></tr>
